affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 独特的；生动的；别致的；图画般的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指广义的“图画”，现多用来指相片、画像。
通常指只画出物体主要特征的图画。
指插入书页之间帮助说明的任何插图或图解。
多指科技书籍或文献中具有概括解说作用的图表、图样或略图。
指用线条或色彩绘成的图画。
着重能够栩栩如生地把事物或场景等描绘出来。
指快速地勾勒或概略地叙述。
侧重指描述细节，给读者或听众提供清晰的视觉图像。
指有代表性或象征性地描述或讲述。
从原义指银幕或电视屏幕上的图像引申指影片。
与the连用指(上映的)电影，电影工业；可指电影院；在英国与the连用还可指电影艺术。
美国英语中的口语用词。

word_group.brief_definition: 照张相；照一张相；拍一张照
明白, 了解(别人描述的情形)
美术明信片；如画的；栩栩如生的
生动的描写；精彩的描述

bilingual.source: She drew a picture of her bedroom.
bilingual.target: 她画了一幅她卧室的画。

bilingual.source: Tell them to draw a picture of themselves.
bilingual.target: 告诉他们画一张自己的画。

bilingual.source: Robin would like to draw a picture of the park.
bilingual.target: 罗宾想画一幅公园的画。

list.abstract: picture，英文单词，名词。意为：图片，摄影得出来的图像。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, that's my picture. It shows Daddy pig watching TV.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，那幅画是我画的！上面画着猪爸爸正在看电视。

yingyinNormal.en: He paints quite a picture, doesn't he?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得很有画面感，不是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The records are not the picture. Pietro. No, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 资料可看不到画面。皮特洛。是的，那你讲给我听吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and he can paint us another lovely picture. And what will you paint next time, George?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了 他还能在为我们画其他可爱的画。乔治，你下次会再画写什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it would be selfish of me to keep it. But it's a picture of you. And you. But you commissioned it. To give to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我自己留着，那就太自私了。但这画里有你。也有你。但是你请人画的。画来送你。

yingyinNormal.en: Dine-Saw! Another dinosaur picture? Well, maybe you can show us all how to paint a dinosaur?
yingyinNormal.zh: 恐龙。再画另一张恐龙是吗？也许你能教教大家如何画恐龙？

yingyinNormal.en: That's George's picture. Well done, Geroge. But this picture from Peppa pig is my favorite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是乔治画的番茄。干得好，乔治。但是这幅画，来自小猪佩奇，是我最喜欢的一幅。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a lovely picture, Peppa. Yes. I am very good at painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这恐龙画得真不错。当然啦，画画可是我的特长呢。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my official NASA portrait. To Stuart, your comic book store is out of this world. Just like the guy in this picture was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的宇航局官方肖像画哦。致斯图尔特，你的漫画店是店上之店，就像画里的人是人上之人 一样。

yingyinNormal.en: What's your name? Gregg, with three "G"'s. Yeah, you're gonna be this picture of a penis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，你叫什么名字？ Gregg 有3个G。好吧，画个鸡鸡给你好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but it's too much stuff. You know like, you got the candles and the foofy schmoofer thing here and over here you got a picture of a watering can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是也太多了，你摆了蜡烛和那个什么东西，这里还有一幅喷壶的画。

yingyinNormal.en: It is home time. I say. What a splendid picture of a house. And what a fierce dinosaur. George and I have been doing Daddy's job. And they've been doing it very well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 该回家了。看啊，这副房子的画真不错！这真是一只凶猛的恐龙啊！乔治和我一直在做爸爸的工作啊。没想到他们还做得挺不错的。

yingyinNormal.en: It is home time. I say. What a splendid picture of a house. And what a fierce dinosaur. George and I have been doing Daddy's job. And they've been doing it very well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 该回家了。看啊，这副房子的画真不错！这真是一只凶猛的恐龙啊！乔治和我一直在做爸爸的工作啊。没想到他们还做得挺不错的。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't see the big picture. I have a little picture. I take it out and look at it, every day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没看到什么大局，我只看得见一幅小画面，我每一天都翻出来看看它。

yingyinNormal.en: So for many of us, this is an unsettling picture, a picture of a country that's importing more than it's making, of a manufacturing system that's dying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我们大多数人来说，这画面让人真不安，这关于美国的画面进口的要比自己产的还多，对于制造业来说，这产业已经死了。

yingyinNormal.en: The last thing I need is another picture of me looking like a porcelain doll.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最不需要的就是一幅让我看起来像个陶瓷洋娃娃的画像。

yingyinNormal.en: We are each a tiny piece of that puzzle that comes together and makes a picture.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都只是其中的一小部分，但却聚在一起组成了一幅画。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you've got my number. Now, give me the picture. You drive a hard bargain. But here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有我的电话号码了，现在，把这幅画给我吧。你真会砍价，给你。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, think about the memory you want me to see. Not even that hard. Just picture it. Let it play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，你想让我看到的记忆片段让它在你的脑中浮现。不是很难。想象画面就好。自然点。不用刻意去想。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it's the ducks. Hello, Mrs. Duck We are painting a picture. The ducks are running through daddy's paint.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，是鸭子们呀。你们好，鸭太太，我们正在画画。鸭子们跑到了猪爸爸的调色板上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an image of something or someone formed on a surface

examination_example.sentence: What might have kept the Victorians from smiling for <highlight>pictures</highlight> in the 1890s?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么让维多利亚时代的人在19世纪90年代的照片中无法微笑呢?

examination_example.sentence: When we look at a face or a <highlight>picture</highlight>, our eyes pause on one spot at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们看一张脸或一幅图时，我们的眼睛每次只停留在一个点上。

examination_example.sentence: Write an essay of 160-200 words based on the following <highlight>picture</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据下图写一篇160-200字的文章。

examination_example.sentence: Although electric cars are still a rarity on roads now, this massive investment could change the <highlight>picture</highlight> rapidly in coming years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管电动汽车目前在道路上仍然很少见，但这一大规模投资可能会在未来几年迅速改变这一局面。

examination_example.sentence: Which part of the jobs <highlight>picture</highlight> was neglected?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就业形势的哪一部分被忽视了?

examination_example.sentence: However, there is another important part of the jobs <highlight>picture</highlight> that was largely overlooked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，就业形势的另一个重要部分在很大程度上被忽视了。

sense_info_list.en: an idea of what someone or something might look like or be like
a situation described in a particular way

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

word_usage.usage: picture作名词时，可用来指某种状况或情形，此时常用作单数形式。

picture作动词时，可表示“在报纸、杂志等上登载...的照片或图片”，此时常用被动语态。
示例：The golfer is pictured on many of the front pages. 
许多报纸的头版上都刊登了那个高尔夫球手的照片。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an image of something or someone formed on a surface

examination_example.sentence: It resembles a <highlight>picture</highlight> in the encyclopedia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它很像百科全书中的一幅画。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pictures</highlight> on a private page that are taken out of context could ruin a perfectly good candidate's chances of getting hired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 私人页面上断章取义的照片可能会毁掉一个非常优秀的候选人被录用的机会。

sense_info_list.en: an idea of what someone or something might look like or be like

examination_example.sentence: A new study has drawn a bleak <highlight>picture</highlight> of cultural inclusiveness reflected in the children's literature available in Australia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究描绘了澳大利亚儿童文学作品中反映的文化包容性的惨淡图景。

sense_info_list.en: a situation described in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: They present a false <highlight>picture</highlight> of the autonomy cars provide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对自动驾驶汽车提供的信息给出了错误的描述。

n. 文化；文明；培养；修养；培养物；态度和行为；栽培

word_usage.usage:
强调画上的内容时，picture前的介词通常用in，不用on。
示例：画上是什么?
误 What is on the picture?
正 What is in the picture?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 秀丽的；别致的；别具一格的；独特的；生动的

word_family.mean: n. 画；图画；画片；照片；影片；画像；印象；概念；肖像；局面

sense_info_list.en: an image of something or someone formed on a surface

examination_example.sentence: Every now and then, I'd save a <highlight>picture</highlight> I liked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时不时地，我会保存一张我喜欢的照片。

examination_example.sentence: They covered lunch boxes with striking red paint and added a <highlight>picture</highlight> of TV and radio cowboy Hopalong Cassidy on the front.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在饭盒上涂上醒目的红色油漆，并在饭盒正面加上了一张电视和广播牛仔Hoppoon Cassidy的照片。

examination_example.sentence: In the initial results, assisted living residents did paint the most positive <highlight>picture</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最初的结果中，居住在辅助生活的居民确实描绘了最积极的画面。

sense_info_list.en: an idea of what someone or something might look like or be like

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Picture</highlight> this: You're at a movie theater food stand loading up on snacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下：你在电影院的食品摊上装满零食。

examination_example.sentence: Similar ideas surround poverty in the U. S. And these assumptions give a false <highlight>picture</highlight> of reality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国，类似的观点也围绕着贫困问题展开。这些假设给出了对现实的错误描述。

examination_example.sentence: The important thing is for all of us to keep in mind the real goal and the longer, bigger <highlight>picture</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是我们所有人都要牢记实际的目标和更长远、更大的图景。

examination_example.sentence: Considering that the government's standards are not nearly ambitious enough, the <highlight>picture</highlight> is clear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到政府的标准还不够高，情况是很清楚的。

examination_example.sentence: It is important to look at the wider <highlight>picture</highlight> of what happens when so many people live for 100 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 展望一下当许多人都能活到100岁时的更广泛的情形很重要。

examination_example.sentence: In the big <highlight>picture</highlight>, medical institutions across the state are starting to make a philosophical switch to becoming a health organization, not just a health care organization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从大局来看，不仅仅是医疗保健组织，全国各地的医疗机构都在开始进行理念上的转换。

sense_info_list.en: a situation described in a particular way

exam_freq_info.chinese: 图画; 图片; 照片
头脑中的情景; 印象

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 图画; 图片; 照片

examination_example.sentence: Paulo Magalhaes, a 34-year-old Portuguese computer engineer, loves to open his mailbox and find a brightly colored <highlight>picture</highlight> of Rome's Colosseum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 34岁的葡萄牙电脑工程师Paulo Magalhaes喜欢打开他的邮箱，然后发现一张色彩鲜艳的罗马斗兽场照片。

examination_example.sentence: When I went online to the OIC website, I saw <highlight>pictures</highlight> of the Iraqi children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我上网访问伊斯兰会议组织的网站时，我看到了伊拉克儿童的照片。

examination_example.sentence: No, I walked on and took a lot of <highlight>pictures</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有，我继续往前走，拍了很多照片。

examination_example.sentence: Mr Bissell skillfully organizes historical insights and cultural references, making his tale a well-rounded <highlight>picture</highlight> of Uzbekistan, seen from Western eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Bissell先生对历史与文化的洞察引证做了巧妙地组织，以西方人的视角全面描绘了乌兹别克斯坦。

examination_example.sentence: To get the most out of reading these plays, try to <highlight>picture</highlight> the play on stage, with you, the reader, in the audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了从阅读这些戏剧中获得最大的收获，试着想象戏剧在舞台上的情景，而你，读者，和观众在一起。

sense_info_list.zh: 头脑中的情景; 印象

构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

exam_freq_info.chinese: 印象; 情景; 想象; 设想

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 照张相；照一张相；拍一张照

sense_info_list.en: an image of something or someone formed on a surface

examination_example.sentence: How many <highlight>pictures</highlight> did they sell that day?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天他们卖了多少幅画?

examination_example.sentence: The writing brushes can be used to draw the <highlight>pictures</highlight> on painted potteries (陶器).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毛笔可以用来在彩陶上画画。

examination_example.sentence: Radio telescopes create <highlight>pictures</highlight> of the sky, not in visible light, but in radio waves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 射电望远镜不是用可见光，而是用无线电波拍摄天空的照片。

sense_info_list.en: an idea of what someone or something might look like or be like
sense_info_list.zh: 印象; 情景; 想象; 设想

examination_example.sentence: However, when I gave my speech on Election Day, the response(反应) wasn't what I had <highlight>pictured</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，当我在选举日发表演讲时，得到的回应并非我想象的那般。

examination_example.sentence: So scientists have given us a new <highlight>picture</highlight>: millions of years ago, it suddenly became very cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，科学家为我们描述了一种新场景：数百万年前，地球突然变得非常寒冷。

examination_example.sentence: My son couldn't get the <highlight>picture</highlight> of Frank out of his mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我儿子老是想着Frank的样子。

examination_example.sentence: Hunter Adams became famous during the 1980s, and in 1998, Universal <highlight>Pictures</highlight> made a film about his life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hunter Adams成名于20世纪80年代。1998年，环球影业制作了一部关于他生活的电影。

examination_example.sentence: The Shape of Water won four Oscars: Best Production Design, Best Score,as well as Best Director and Best <highlight>Picture</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《水形物语》获得了4项奥斯卡奖：最佳制作设计奖、最佳配乐奖、最佳导演奖和最佳影片奖。

examination_example.sentence: But for those who were born after 1985, it is a different <highlight>picture</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对于那些1985年以后出生的人来说，情况就不一样了。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

word_usage.usage:
强调画上的内容时，picture前的介词通常用in，不用on。
示例：画上是什么?
误 What is on the picture?
正 What is in the picture?

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 除了可以表示“照片；相片”之外，还可以指图画、图片等，范围较广。
